channel.title: CVE Feed for amans2k -- Funnel Builder for WordPress by FunnelKit – Customize WooCommerce Checkout Pages, Create Sales Funnels, Order Bumps & One Click Upsells
channel.description: The latest CVEs for amans2k -- Funnel Builder for WordPress by FunnelKit – Customize WooCommerce Checkout Pages, Create Sales Funnels, Order Bumps & One Click Upsells

item.title: CVE-2024-5192|2024-08-01T21:03:10.981Z -- amans2k -- funnel%20builder%20for%20wordpress%20by%20funnelkit%20%E2%80%93%20customize%20woocommerce%20checkout%20pages%2C%20create%20sales%20funnels%2C%20order%20bumps%20%26%20one%20click%20upsells
item.description: The Funnel Builder for WordPress by FunnelKit – Customize WooCommerce Checkout Pages, Create Sales Funnels, Order Bumps & One Click Upsells plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘mimes’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 3.3.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Author-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-6836|2024-08-01T21:45:38.349Z -- amans2k -- funnel%20builder%20for%20wordpress%20by%20funnelkit%20%E2%80%93%20customize%20woocommerce%20checkout%20pages%2C%20create%20sales%20funnels%2C%20order%20bumps%20%26%20one%20click%20upsells
item.description: The Funnel Builder for WordPress by FunnelKit – Customize WooCommerce Checkout Pages, Create Sales Funnels, Order Bumps & One Click Upsells plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on multiple functions in all versions up to, and including, 3.4.6. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to update multiple settings, including templates, designs, checkouts, and other plugin settings.

item.title: CVE-2024-6836|2024-07-24T05:31:55.874Z -- amans2k -- funnel%20builder%20for%20wordpress%20by%20funnelkit%20%E2%80%93%20customize%20woocommerce%20checkout%20pages%2C%20create%20sales%20funnels%2C%20order%20bumps%20%26%20one%20click%20upsells

This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to update multiple settings, including templates, designs, checkouts, and other plugin settings.

This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Author-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
